scripts.start: npm run-script remove-old-build && npm run-script build-react && npm run-script copy-logo && electron .
scripts.build-react: cd ../web3-2019-webapp-week_7 && npm run-script build && move ./build ../electron-test && cd ../electron-test
scripts.build: npm run-script remove-old-build && npm run-script build-react && npm run-script copy-logo && npm run-script build-electron
